title: Egg Cosy, ca. 1900
medium:
Medium: silk and linen on linen foundation
Technique: cutwork with buttonhole, overcasting and knot stitches on plain weave foundation; areas of the foundation were cut away revealing the blue plain weave padded lining
description: Head of a hound dog on the top half of an oval. Patterend with cutwork designs. A collar of flowers made of ombre woven ribbon around the dog's neck. The eye is a knot of red silk.

tombstone.epitaph:
Egg Cosy, ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. Medium: silk and linen on linen foundation
Technique: cutwork with buttonhole, overcasting and knot stitches on plain weave foundation; areas of the foundation were cut away revealing the blue plain weave padded lining. Gift of Sabina Gathedral. 1978-110-1.
